rows.label: qst201302_msg0001
rows.name:
You saw the poster I put up?
It would be so great if you could help!

rows.label: qst201302_msg0002
rows.name:
The poster mentioned some missing
children... What exactly has happened?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0003
rows.name:
Just recently, my son and a bunch of
other kids disappeared without a trace.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0004
rows.name:
This isn't something that usually
happens here on Goldmund.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0005
rows.name:
Me and the other parents got together
and organized a search party, but there
was no sign of them anywhere.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0006
rows.name:
My wife's so worried about whether
our son is safe, she can barely even
work up the appetite to eat.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0007
rows.name:
Of course...anyone would be worried
in a situation like this.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0008
rows.name:
To be frank, it's more than me and
the other parents can handle, so we're
looking for anyone who can help out.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0009
rows.name: And that's why you put up that poster?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0010
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0011
rows.name:
Sorry to bother you, but could you
help us find any clue to where the
kids might have gone?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0012
rows.name:
Absolutely. Don't worry - we'll bring
those children home safe and sound.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0013
rows.name: That's mighty fine of you to say that.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0014
rows.name: Might I ask the name of your son?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0015
rows.name: He's called Siarmal.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0016
rows.name:
He's a very curious, mischievous sort
of boy, but he's an angel at heart.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0021
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201302_msg0017
rows.name:
I'm going to do another sweep of
Goldmund, so could you guys ask
around on the ground floor?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0018
rows.name:
The kids're always playing around the
Exit Dock and the Return Port, so the
merchants might have seen something.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0019
rows.name:
Though of course, people are always
coming and going from Avaritia, so
I doubt they'll remember everyone...

rows.label: qst201302_msg0022
rows.name:
Thank you for the information.
Leave the rest to me.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0020
rows.name: Thanks. I'm counting on you.
